list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: Homework 5 Created IconButton component that is like the Button component, but uses font awesome icon instead of text. Added "+10s" and "-10s" in player controls on room page. Changed play/pause button from Button with "PLAY"/"PAUSE" text to IconButton with play/pause icons.

task.summary: Installed node-sass, react-router-dom and @types/react-router-dom packages. Moved App, and Button and Avatar components stylesheets from css to sccs.
Created basic navigation (without styles). Created placeholder components for Posts and Details.
Stylized app navigation and home page. Changed color of Hello component text.
Finished Details page. Created LoadingIndicator component. Added getPostById function to api.
Fixed position of LoadingIndicator on Posts and Details pages.
Added a message that id displayed when post is not loaded to Details page.
Added "/*" route to App. It routes to Home page.
Changed type of post state of Details and set default value to null.

Homework 3. Created custom Textarea element. Added message input field with check for emptiness to the Chat page. If message is empty, the send button is disabled. Created Message and MessageBubble components. Added an areSpacesAllowed prop to Input component. If it is false, the field value is considered invalid when it has spaces.

Homework 4 Separated chat messages into component ChatMessages with parameters messages: ChatMessage[] and user?: UserInfo|null. Added username prop to Message and MessageBubble components. Made avatar an optional parameter in Message component. Avatar image is displayed only if avatar is passed.
Added emoji picker to chat message input. Used emoji-picker-react.

MESSAGE.value: Installed node-sass, react-router-dom and @types/react-router-dom packages. Moved App, and Button and Avatar components stylesheets from css to sccs.
Created basic navigation (without styles). Created placeholder components for Posts and Details.
Stylized app navigation and home page. Changed color of Hello component text.
Finished Details page. Created LoadingIndicator component. Added getPostById function to api.
Fixed position of LoadingIndicator on Posts and Details pages.
Added a message that id displayed when post is not loaded to Details page.
Added "/*" route to App. It routes to Home page.
Changed type of post state of Details and set default value to null.

Homework 3. Created custom Textarea element. Added message input field with check for emptiness to the Chat page. If message is empty, the send button is disabled. Created Message and MessageBubble components. Added an areSpacesAllowed prop to Input component. If it is false, the field value is considered invalid when it has spaces.

Homework 4 Separated chat messages into component ChatMessages with parameters messages: ChatMessage[] and user?: UserInfo|null. Added username prop to Message and MessageBubble components. Made avatar an optional parameter in Message component. Avatar image is displayed only if avatar is passed.
Added emoji picker to chat message input. Used emoji-picker-react.
